rooms.description: Spacious living area with Mediterranean styling, featuring stone accents and open design to embrace the irregular plot layout.
Integrated dining space that flows into the living room, designed with wooden finishes and ambient lighting.
Modern Mediterranean kitchen with an island counter and ample storage, ensuring workflow efficiency.
Luxurious master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet, incorporating Mediterranean design elements.
Cozy second bedroom suitable for a joint family member or guest, with attached small study area.
Shared dressing room and wardrobe space designed to optimize storage for the joint family.

openings.description: Main entry door placed in a central location with proper Vastu orientation, ensuring energy flow.
Opening leading to the swimming pool area at the rear, designed for easy access and privacy.

additional_features.description: Irregularly shaped swimming pool integrated into the backyard, designed with Mediterranean style elements and safety barriers.

rooms.description: Multi-purpose entertainment zone with home theater or media space, designed to accommodate family gatherings.
Additional guest room for visiting extended family members or guests, complete with essential amenities.

openings.description: Staircase connecting upper and lower floors with an open design to maintain airflow.
